bsputils_uart.h File Reference
Sample Example API » Sample Example - Utility library API » Application UART helper APIs

Header file to use application level uart helper functions. More...

Macros

#define BSP_UTILS_UART_RX_DEFAULT_TIMEOUT   (10U)
 Uart default timeout.
 
#define BSP_UTILS_UART_RX_WAIT_FOREVER   (0xFFFFFFFFU)
 Timeout value to be passed to have blocking uart read.

Int32 BspUtils_uartGetStr (char *pRxBuffer, UInt32 bufSize, UInt32 timeoutVal)
 Reads string from UART console. This breaks on carraige return or timeout or char read exceeds the buffer size. This will also terminate the string with NULL character. More...
 
Int32 BspUtils_uartGetChar (char *pRxBuffer, UInt32 timeoutVal)
 Reads a char from UART console. More...
 
Int32 BspUtils_uartGetNum (Int32 *pInt, UInt32 timeoutVal)
 Reads integer from the UART console BspUtils_uartInit needs to be called prior to any uarRead. More...
